title: Ticket #229: Unattended Windows install: HOSTALLOWADMINISTATOR broken
description:
When doing an unattended windows installation via the MSI package, specifying HOSTALLOWADMINISTATOR via the command-line is ignored!

This was first first reported on condor-users; see the post for details.

I reproduced the problem. Looking in the MSI install log, it seems like msi understood the HOSTALLOWADMINISTRATOR change, but yet it did not make it into condor_config. Maybe something was lost passing the value from the msi script to condor_setup.exe ? Note that HOSTALLOWADMINISTRATOR is the last arg in the command line, wonder if that is what makes it "special"...
remarks:
2009-Feb-21 12:06:40 by tannenba:
Was just a type in the manual! Note the missing "R" ! Resolve when manual fixed.
